crafter.title: Crafter
crafter.name: Yahya J. Aifit
crafter.description: Front-end web developer, currently living and working in Indonesia.

job.title: Current Job
job.intro: Day-to-day responsibilities at the company where I work:
job.content:
Day-to-day responsibilities at the company where I work:

Maintain the Design System

  • Create/update component based on design specification
  • Audit components to deliver good performance and quality
  • Provide guidance to engineers who wish to contribute

Build Internal Tools

  • Build and maintain internal tools for UX Researcher
  • Brainstorming with project-owner to create new feature/improvement
  • Prioritize tasks and make development timeline

Contribute to Other Project

  • Collaborate with other teams to build cross-team projects, eg: company websites, email newsletter and microsite campaign

The main thing is about working together with team, give each other feedback and discuss to find the best solution to solve problem.

website.title: Website
website.intro:
Build with Vue.js, using IBM Plex font, using icon from Teenyicons.

Inspired by Web Desktop and here some curated list of it:

changelog.title: Changelog
changelog.content:
v1.7.0

  • Fetching Tumblr and WordPress API for mobile version
  • Component improvements:
    • Box
    • Thumbnail
  • New components:
    • Shimmer
    • ShimmerGroup

v1.6.2

  • Component improvements:
    • Knob:
      • Icon position adjustment
    • Popup:
      • Enhance inactive style
      • Adding overlay when dragged to prevent unexpected hover

v1.6.1

  • Layout improvement:
    • Prevent dragging the whole Popup container out of Wrapper

v1.6.0

  • Different behaviour on small screen
  • New components:
    • Knob
    • Expand
    • BottomBar
    • Thumbnail
    • BottomMenu

v1.5.0

  • Bug fixing:
    • Can't back to initial position if Popup closed
  • Layout improvements:
    • Different CSS style for active and inactive Popup
    • Show warning message in small screen
  • New component:
    • Announcement

v1.4.1

  • Improve drag performance

v1.4.0

  • Show notification when the network goes offline

v1.3.0

  • Visitor can change wallpaper
  • New component:
    • Color

v1.2.1

  • Bug fixing:
    • z-index between Popup not working properly
    • Popup can't back to previous position after click minimize icon.

v1.2.0

  • Ability to set Popup position manually
  • Component improvements:
    • Popup
    • Post
  • New component:
    • Box

v1.1.0

  • Adding realtime clock
  • Component improvements:
    • TopBar
    • Popup

v1.0.0

  • Stable release
